content:
Changes for wx3.2
Parking relative to the OCPN frame no longer relevant as it does not hold when the frame is moved.
I have had to abandon that and now park relative to the screen.
This also solves the problem with fullscreen mode. That now works fine.
So the default parking parameters have to be redone. I have built in defaults for MacOS Ventura.
Mike - please use the utility tab in the plugin tools to get default parameters for Windows and Linux and send them to me.

I have fixed the problem with child windows getting covered by the frame on MacOSn :smile:

New builds in my Alpha repository just gone in. Version bumped to 2.0.3.
Source in branch v2.0.3-wx3.2

Once I have built in the default parking parameters for Windows and Linux, I propose to issue as production release for OCPN5.7.1+
